meta.name: Sample Campaign: SaaS Product Launch
meta.description: End-to-end example showing how marketing agents, playbooks, prompts, and skills work together
meta.purpose: Test/demonstration file - shows complete campaign execution flow

campaign_brief.key_value_prop: AI that learns your work patterns and automates your busywork

campaign_objectives: Establish thought leadership in AI productivity space

creative_direction.visual_style: Clean, minimal, gradient purples and teals, motion graphics
creative_direction.video_style: Fast-paced cuts, screen recordings with motion graphics overlay
creative_direction.copy_tone: Smart but accessible, no jargon, action-oriented

deliverables.hero_headline: Your AI Work Partner That Actually Gets You
deliverables.subheadline: FlowState learns your patterns, automates the boring stuff, and lets you focus on work that matters.

email_sequence.email_2_subject: Here's what FlowState can do for you
email_sequence.email_4_subject: We're live. Your invite is inside.

social_captions.teaser:
Something's coming. And it's about to change how you work. üëÄ

#FlowState #AIProductivity

No more:

ad_copy_variations.primary: Drowning in busywork? Your AI just entered the chat.
ad_copy_variations.headline: Automate the boring stuff
ad_copy_variations.description: FlowState learns your patterns and handles the rest.

ad_copy_variations.primary: Imagine an AI that actually understands how YOU work.
ad_copy_variations.headline: Your personal productivity AI
ad_copy_variations.description: Get 3 hours back every day with FlowState.

ad_copy_variations.primary: 500 people already joined the waitlist this week.
ad_copy_variations.headline: The productivity tool everyone's talking about
ad_copy_variations.description: See why teams are switching to FlowState.

hero_image.prompt: abstract flowing gradient visualization, deep purple to teal transition, clean minimal aesthetic, subtle geometric particles, depth and dimension, premium tech product feel, optimistic futuristic mood --ar 16:9 --s 200 --v 6.1

instagram_post.prompt: modern productivity dashboard interface, soft glow effects, purple teal gradient, clean UI design, floating elements, isometric style, premium software aesthetic --ar 1:1 --s 150 --v 6.1

linkedin_banner.prompt: professional abstract tech visualization, flowing data streams, purple to teal, corporate premium feel, clean modern, business context --ar 4:1 --s 100 --v 6.1

twitter_header.prompt: minimal abstract gradient, purple teal, clean modern, tech brand aesthetic, simple elegant --ar 3:1 --s 150 --v 6.1

static_ads.prompt_base: clean minimal product mockup, laptop showing dashboard interface, soft studio lighting, gradient background {color}, professional product photography style --ar 4:5 --s 100 --v 6.1

runway_prompts.prompt: abstract purple particles forming into organized patterns, dark background, cinematic depth of field, smooth flowing motion, premium tech aesthetic
professional person overwhelmed at desk with notifications, stressed expression softening to relief, natural office lighting, lifestyle commercial style
sleek dashboard interface with AI assistant animation, smooth transitions, soft glow effects, premium software demo feel

voiceover.script: You didn't get into this career to answer emails all day. [pause] To copy-paste the same data into five different tools. [pause] To lose three hours before you even start the work that matters. [pause] FlowState changes that. [pause] Our AI learns how you work, then handles the rest. [pause] Scheduling, follow-ups, data entry, routine decisions - automated. [pause] So you can focus on what only you can do. [pause] FlowState. Your AI work partner. [pause] Join the waitlist today.

background_music.prompt: Modern electronic ambient, subtle synth pads, gentle build, 90 BPM, optimistic technology vibes, clean production, no vocals, corporate tech commercial style, builds to inspiring finish

feature_spotlights_15s.runway_prompt: AI interface showing automated workflow, tasks completing themselves, satisfying check animations, clean minimal design, smooth motion
peaceful focused worker, notifications fading away, calm productive atmosphere, warm lighting, zen productivity aesthetic
abstract neural network learning visualization, patterns forming, purple teal colors, elegant AI aesthetic, smooth flowing animation

review_checklist.notes: All assets use brand purple-teal palette
Primary CTA 'Join the Waitlist' used consistently

revisions_requested: Email 3 subject line feels too urgent - soften
LinkedIn ad needs more professional hook

social_media_manager_actions.engagement_plan: Active monitoring, respond within 30 minutes, amplify positive mentions

audiences: Interest: productivity apps, remote work, AI tools

linkedin_ads.targeting: Job titles: Product Manager, Engineering Manager, Startup Founder

performance_marketer_actions.tracking_setup: UTM parameters on all links, conversion tracking pixels installed, analytics dashboard created

actions_taken: Increased budget on top performer by 50%
Created 3 new headline variations based on winner

what_worked: Problem-focused messaging resonated more than feature-focused
Launch week email sequence had 45% open rate
agent_coordination_notes: Creative Director review before asset finalization saved revision cycles
Brand Guardian catch on email subject line prevented off-brand messaging
Parallel creation by Copywriter + Visual Creator + Video Producer accelerated timeline

tools_used_summary: Runway Gen-3 Alpha Turbo - Video generation
